section.title: Plugin Identification
section.paragraph: Your plugin code is required to contain an alias named "mts.plugin.plugin_namespace", where 'plugin_namespace' is the namespace of your plugin. For example, if your plugin's namespace was "praetoolbar", your alias would be named "mts.plugin.praetoolbar".
This alias takes no parameters and returns $true or 1.
This is done so that when support for your plugin is found within a theme, the engine can check $mts.plugin.plugin_namespace to see if the plugin is installed.
